description: Aspose.Words for .NET class library supports DOC, DOCX, RTF, HTML, OpenDocument, PDF, XPS, EPUB and other formats. With Aspose.Words you can generate, modify, convert, render and print documents without utilizing Microsoft Word®
releaseNotes:
There are 115 improvements and fixes in this regular monthly release. The most notable are: • Further features and improvements in DrawingML Charts rendering • Textboxes rendering improvements • "Zero-weight" files are now supported • Various improvements in handling of MS Word formats This release introduces the new features, enhancements and fixes to the excptions/bugs as detailed below: • New features WORDSNET-1638 /cell border diagonal/ Render diagonal cell borders in the new layout WORDSNET-3315 /Word Perfect Justification/ ROOT Extra page is added upon rendering. WORDSNET-3732 /cell border diagonal/ Diagonal table border disappears during rendering. WORDSNET-6968 Support advanced chart features. WORDSNET-8084 Support advanced 3D charts features. WORDSNET-8867 Support "Display Units" upon rendering axis labels. WORDSNET-8877 Tab spacing is not respected in fixed page formats WORDSNET-8895 Doc to Pdf conversion issue with text (underscore) rendering WORDSNET-8898 Add option in PdfSaveOptions for Open Type of Pdf • Enhancements WORDSJAVA-754 Unproperly resolved RTL text with incorrect properties inside SDT. WORDSJAVA-772 WMF XOR (SRCINVERT) operation unproperly rendered to PDF WORDSJAVA-773 Wmf image is filled by black background. WORDSJAVA-781 Publically set TableName in com.aspose.words.DataTable WORDSNET-3270 Distance between bullets and text is too big after importing HTML. WORDSNET-4197 HTML export: Table's lines disappeared in IE9, Chrome, Opera browsers WORDSNET-5868 CompatibilityOptions.DoNotExpandShiftReturn is not working with PDF files WORDSNET-6607 Font has changed after appending one document to another WORDSNET-7023 Incorrect floater vertical position if relative to a paragraph inside a floating table WORDSNET-7829 /cell border diagonal/ Diagonal borders in a table cell are lost when rendering to PDF WORDSNET-8678 Aspose.Words.Document does not open empty document WORDSNET-8711 Docx to HTML conversion issue with table border WORDSNET-8792 Multiple bookmarks are generated in PDF for one bookmark in header of document WORDSNET-8801 GroupShape causes Aspose.Words to throw System.ArgumentException during exporting a Doc to Html WORDSNET-8844 Page Left Margin increases after conversion from HTML to Pdf WORDSNET-8849 Provide method to add Built-in style in the Document.Styles collection WORDSNET-8860 Page background is corrupted while rendering WORDSNET-8891 'Times New Roman' 8pt text gets blurred when exported to image on Windows 8 WORDSNET-8896 Doc to Pdf conversion issue with Text Indents • Exceptions WORDSJAVA-750 java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException occurs when rendering Docx to Pdf WORDSJAVA-769 NullPointerException occurs when saving doc as pdf in multiple threads WORDSNET-8788 title: Aspose.Words for .Net
